item.title: How Its Made Pt1
item.description: Intro First thing first, we’re going to need some infrastructure to host the blog. I’ve decided to over-engineer this because I enjoy that sort of thing. I’m going to host it entirely in AWS. Components: S3 Bucket to host the static blog CloudFront Distribution to serve the blog over HTTPS Route53 Alias record to point blog.martinlee.org at the CloudFront Distribution Tools: awscli terraform Setup We’ll use terraform to generate everything.
